name: Pong Battle Attack
description:
Pong Battle Attack is a pong inspired game where you have to score against the enemy to take down their health.

  • Rally longer to make your attack more powerful (be careful because the enemy can use that power against you as well.
  • Multiple Difficulties
  • You have a shield available, but you must wait until it is charged up before it's useful. Shields will take 100% of incoming damage.
  • Try hitting the ball while moving to give it a spin and take the enemy off their game.

This was a prototype designed for me to get back into game development. While it is a prototype, the future of the project is unknown. If you would like me to continue working on it, just let me know by playing it, commenting on it, or sharing it.

This game is fully playable, but may have missing features, bugs, or minor graphical issues. This game runs best at 1920x1080. You could experience in-game objects not in the correct place, if played at a different resolution.
